description:
Glalie is known as the "Face Pok√©mon." It has a rock body that it reinforces with a layer of diamond-like ice crystals that won`t melt, even under fire. It has the ability to freely control ice by freezing moisture in any shape that it wishes. It uses this to instantly freeze enemies and eat them at its leisure.
In the anime, Ash Ketchum has a Glalie while in Hoenn. It evolves from his Snorunt, and he keeps it throughout the season. Later, he leaves it at Professor Oak`s lab upon returning from Hoenn.
name: Onigohri
